combat.auto-anchor: Automatically places and explodes respawn anchors.
combat.auto-totem: Automatically places totem and other items in your offhand.
combat.blocker: Protect your surround from cev, civ, and others.
combat.cer-breaker: Mines blocks above player head and explodes crystals.
combat.piston-aura: Automatically pushes crystals in player HitBox using pistons.
combat.piston-push: Automatically pushes players from safe holes using pistons.
combat.surround: Surrounds your legs using specified blocks.

client.optifine-capes: Allows to use Optifine capes without optifine.
